Description: Exact column name in the data file.
Clear definition of the column's meaning.
TRUE if the column is required for each row

column6: UCUM or other unit ontology). Use when the column represents a measurement with units.

Description: IRI for the ontology term that represents what this column measures or represents. Links the column to concepts in the DFO Salmon Ontology.

column8: skos_concept). Helps validators understand how to interpret the term_iri.
